snippet: To the Editor:    ''California on Edge of Failing to Meet Electricity Needs'' (front page, Aug. 3) sets forth the primary reason for the emergency facing San Diego this summer: a shortage of generating capacity....
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: ''California on Edge of Failing to Meet Electricity Needs'' (front page, Aug. 3) sets forth the primary reason for the emergency facing San Diego this summer: a shortage of generating capacity.
abstract: Letter from Lynne H Church, president of Electric Power Supply Assn, disputes August 3 article on causes of California's power shortages (S)
